TERM: Computer Vision and Image Processing

DEFINITION:
Computer Vision and Image Processing: Object Detection:

Image Segmentation:

Facial Recognition:

By integrating advanced computer vision and image processing into the SPR_compressor system, we can enable the system to understand and interpret visual data, enhancing its ability to support decision-making and problem-solving.

Another potential area for exploration is the integration of advanced audio processing and speech recognition to enable the system to understand and interpret audio data.
